data.title: Cercospora canescens (Cercospora leaf spot)
data.meta_description:
This datasheet on Cercospora canescens covers Identity, Distribution, Hosts/Species
Affected, Diagnosis, Impacts, Prevention/Control, Further Information.
data.text:
Abstract
